paper_metadata.title: BRICKS WITHOUT STRAW: OVERCOMING RESOURCE LIMITATIONS TO ARCHITECT ECOSYSTEM LEADERSHIP XIANWEI SHI Shanghai Jiao Tong University XINGKUN LIANG Peking University SHAHZAD (SHAZ) ANSARI University of Cambridge
paper_metadata.research_context: Nine-year longitudinal qualitative case study of Xiaomi within the Android ecosystem and the Chinese smartphone industry (including archival data, 112 semi-structured interviews, and participant observation).
